title: Leather, ca. 1750
creditline: Museum purchase through gift in memory of Josephine C. Howell and through bequest of Edith M. Henderson and from Sarah Cooper-Hewitt Fund
description: Central motif of a floral bouquet in an urn, on top of a lambrequin. This is enframed by scrolling strapwork and foliage. The  background is filled with varying forms of trellis work.

tombstone.epitaph:
Leather, ca. 1750.
ca. 1750. Leather, painted, gilded. Museum purchase through gift in memory of Josephine C. Howell and through bequest of Edith M. Henderson and from Sarah Cooper-Hewitt Fund. 1989-34-2.
